description:
Unleash the ultimate fear with this unbeatable deal! Get your hands on the Horror Bundle 3 in 1, a terrifying collection of spine-chilling games that will keep you on the edge of your seat. This bundle includes:

Fatum Betula: Enter a world without a past and experience nostalgia, childlike fear, and wonder.
Paratopic: With its haunting atmosphere and horror vibe, this game will remain in the dark corners of your mind after playthrough.
Blood Breed: A brutal, retro-styled survival horror game that challenges you to survive a nightmare filled with blood, gore, and a murderous maniac hunting you down.
Dive into these immersive, hand-crafted environments with retro 3D visuals and experimental gameplay. Don't miss this chance to experience all three horrifying adventures at a special discounted price!
name: Horror Bundle - 3 in 1
intro: Horror Bundle 3 in 1: Paratopic + Fatum Betula + Blood Breed
